trans-unit.target: pomander of safety<tab>pomanders of safety<tab>Pomander of Safety<tab>Removes all traps from the current <var 09 E96E ((floor)) ((floor)) ((floor)) ((area)) /var>.
pomander of sight<tab>pomanders of sight<tab>Pomander of Sight<tab>Reveals the current <var 09 E96E ((floor)) ((floor)) ((floor)) ((area)) /var>'s map and the location of all hidden traps.
pomander of strength<tab>pomanders of strength<tab>Pomander of Strength<tab>Increases damage dealt and HP recovered via healing magic by 30%.
pomander of steel<tab>pomanders of steel<tab>Pomander of Steel<tab>Decreases damage received by 40%.

pomander of affluence<tab>pomanders of affluence<tab>Pomander of Affluence<tab>Increases the number of treasure coffers <var 08 E4E96E05 ((in)) ((on)) /var> the next <var 09 E96E ((floor)) ((floor)) ((floor)) ((area)) /var>.

pomander of flight<tab>pomanders of flight<tab>Pomander of Flight<tab>Decreases the number of enemies <var 08 E4E96E05 ((in)) ((on)) /var> the next <var 09 E96E ((floor)) ((floor)) ((floor)) ((area)) /var>.

pomander of alteration<tab>pomanders of alteration<tab>Pomander of Alteration<tab>Changes the enemy occupying a random room <var 08 E4E96E05 ((in)) ((on)) /var> the next <var 09 E96E ((floor)) ((floor)) ((floor)) ((area)) /var> into a mimic or a mandragora.
pomander of purity<tab>pomanders of purity<tab>Pomander of Purity<tab>Removes the Pox status.

pomander of witching<tab>pomanders of witching<tab>Pomander of Witching<tab>Transforms all targets within range into a frog, imp, or chicken.
pomander of serenity<tab>pomanders of serenity<tab>Pomander of Serenity<tab>Removes all enchantments from the current <var 09 E96E ((floor)) ((floor)) ((floor)) ((area)) /var>.
pomander of rage<tab>pomanders of rage<tab>Pomander of Rage<tab>Transforms user into a manticore.
pomander of lust<tab>pomanders of lust<tab>Pomander of Lust<tab>Transforms user into a succubus.
pomander of intuition<tab>pomanders of intuition<tab>Pomander of Intuition<tab>Reveals the current floor's hidden treasure.
pomander of raising<tab>pomanders of raising<tab>Pomander of Raising<tab>Instantly raises the first party member to be KO'd.
pomander of resolution<tab>pomanders of resolution<tab>Pomander of Resolution<tab>Transforms user into Kuribu.
pomander of frailty<tab>pomanders of frailty<tab>Pomander of Frailty<tab>Weakens all enemies <var 08 E4E96E05 ((in)) ((on)) /var> current <var 09 E96E ((floor)) ((floor)) ((floor)) ((area)) /var>.
